example_messages: What can you help me with?
title: Hello, I am a cool copilot!
description:
Im here to help developers like you with any questions you have about RPM 
so you can integrate avatars into your app fast, without any previous experience. 
 I can help you debug, provide code, tutorials and much more.
footer: Co-pilot may produce inaccurate information about people, places, or facts.
